title: Viper by GLD Products Junior 48" 2-Piece Billiard/Pool Cue, Pink Lady, 16 Ounce, One Size (50-0401)
features: Constructed from quality hard Canadian Maple wood and features edgy tattoo style graphics down the length of the cue
Designed with a 2-piece billiard cue, allowing for easy transportation and storage; Part of the Pink Lady profits are donated to Breast Cancer Research
Features lightweight ABS joints help provide consistent feedback during play
Each billiard cue is finished off with a 13mm Le Pro leather tip, nylon wrap and a traditional rubber bumper
Available in 16 ounce cue weights, perfect for those tight spaces or perhaps a younger player looking for a lighter weight
description: The Viper Junior 48-Inch, 2-Piece Pink Lady Billiard Cue is constructed from quality hard Canadian Maple wood and features edgy tattoo style graphics down the length of the cue. Part of the Pink Lady profits are donated to Breast Cancer Research. Several stainless steel rings along the forearm and sleeve add to the uniqueness and overall design. Featuring lightweight ABS joints which help provide consistent feedback during play. With its 16 ounce cue weight and 48-inch length this billiard cue is perfect for those tight spaces or perhaps a younger player looking for a lighter weight. Each billiard cue is finished off with a 13mm Le Pro leather tip, nylon wrap and a traditional rubber bumper.
